articles.title: Digital dollar: ECASH bill would let Treasury create token, bypass Fed - Markets Insider
articles.description: US lawmakers proposed a bill for a digital dollar to be issued by the US Treasury, rather than the Federal Reserve, on Monday.
articles.content:
Four US lawmakers proposed a new bill Monday that would authorize the Treasury Department rather than the 
Federal Reserve to create and issue an electronic dollar.
